babbage.name: Dynamic Supply Chain with Token Rent
babbage.description: Blockchain-based supply chain management with MNEE token rent payments
babbage.author: Open Run Asia

protocolPermissions.description: Create receive addresses for MNEE token rent payments
Record supply chain actions on overlay network

basketAccess.description: For holding and spending MNEE stablecoin tokens for rent payments
For storing supply chain stage transactions

certificateAccess.description: For identity verification of supply chain participants
